function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exposure of guinea pigs to ward air may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control intervention in the control group","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Imbalanced airflow between animal enclosures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of statistical analysis to compare tb infections between groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired infections from smear-positive hiv patients with pulmonary tb","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air mixing in patient wards","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate animal ethical approval and supervision","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diminished uv intensity at height 1.8 m","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High negative ion concentration in the ionizer enclosure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dust-related tb outbreak due to ionizer cleaning","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tb in the exposure chambers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity of tb-infected animals in exposure chambers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination of the environment with tb particulates","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possibility of airborne transmission of tb disease","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nonsignificant trend for uv lights to be more protective than ionizers against tb infection and disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in tb infections and disease due to ionizers and uv lights","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tb in a clinical setting.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate positioning or installation of uv fixtures leading to occupant over-exposure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of safety measures leading to adverse uv effects on patients and staff","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to mitigate tb infection due to lack of uv light intervention in congregate settings","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate uv intensity due to lack of maintenance and degradation of uv bulbs.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear guidelines for upper-room uv installation and maintenance, leading to ineffective use.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependence on expensive uv fixtures and bulbs, limiting accessibility in resource-limited settings.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on natural convection currents for effective uv light efficacy, which may not be sufficient in all environments.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective air mixing in patient rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room uv in protecting health care workers from airborne infection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adverse effect of increasing relative humidity on uv germicidal efficacy","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher ion densities achieved in poultry studies may not be applicable to healthcare environments, reducing the effectiveness of ionizers in preventing tb transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Accumulation of potentially infectious particles onto adjacent surfaces or grounded parts of the ionizer, leading to localized outbreak of tb-infected animals and potential risk of transmission to humans.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Static charge interference with medical equipment due to ionizers, potentially leading to malfunctions or hazards in medical equipment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning and handling of the ionizers leading to potential contamination","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of testing with artificial aerosols to evaluate airflow patterns and particle loss between ward and roof","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential differences in ionizer effect on tb transmission between ward and animal facility","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Tb infection spreading in overcrowded settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of studies in clinical settings for environmental control measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with ppd conversion and tb infection in animals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding in congregate settings","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of respiratory isolation facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious spread of mycobacterium tuberculosis through airborne droplets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dormant tuberculosis bacteria causing disease years after initial infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drug-resistant tuberculosis requiring prolonged and challenging treatment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of drug-resistant m. tuberculosis strains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resurgence of tuberculosis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission in healthcare settings and resource-limited settings","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to untreated air from an hiv-tb ward","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of infectious particles in the air","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air circulation in the ward","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Upper-room uv lights and negative air ionization might not be effective at preventing airborne tuberculosis transmission in humans.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information dissemination on tuberculosis prevention and control measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
